pages-strings.That’s it ! Enjoy your private package m: Tudo pronto! Aproveite o seu novo gerenciador de pacotes privado.
pages-strings.Many great developers are already enjoyi: Many great developers are already enjoying Verdaccio, join the community!
pages-strings.**npm**, **yarn** and **pnpm** are part: **npm**, **yarn** and **pnpm** are part of any development workflow we try to catch up with the latest updates.
pages-strings.The most popular npm clients are support: Os maioria dos clientes npm são suportados
pages-strings.We have an official **Docker** image rea: We have an official **Docker** image ready to use
pages-strings.and **Kubernetes Helm** support for easy: and **Kubernetes Helm** support for easy deployment
pages-strings.Verdaccio is plugin based, authenticatio: Verdaccio is plugin based, authentication, middleware and storage support. Just pick one or create your custom one.
